title: Mackie trackion 3.0
description:
The Tracktion 3 Project Bundle is one of the fastest ways to get started producing professional music on Mac or PC. The streamlined audio and MIDI recording, mixing, editing and mastering are all handled via a clutter-free, single-screen user interface that keeps the music flowing. With no limits on track counts, virtual instruments, and plug-ins, you\&#039;re only limited by your computer\&#039;s capabilities. A Loop Browser with automatic pitch and tempo adjustment make working with loops a breeze, and the Tracktion 3 Project Bundle utilizes a high-definition 64-bit/192kHz mix engine for superior sound. The Tracktion 3 Project Bundle gives you the tools to fulfill your musical destiny!

Mackie Tracktion 3 Project Bundle Audio and MIDI Production Software at a Glance:

A powerful composing and recording tool

Quicktime video and ReWire support

Easy, flexible editing and mixing, incredible plug-ins

Powerful composing and recording capabilities
Tracktion 3 gives you a full arsenal of composition and recording tools, such as the time-saving Loop Browser, multiple-pass loop recording, streamlined MIDI editor, tons of virtual instruments, time stretch/pitch shift, and an unlimited track count so you can go wherever your inspiration takes you. An intuitive single-screen interface puts everything where you can easily get to it, and Safe Record guarantees there won\&#039;t be any untentional wipeouts. Tracktion 3\&#039;s 64-bit/192kHz-capable mix engine gives you high-definition sound with great headroom for pro-level results.

ReWire and Quicktime video support
Tracktion 3 includes full ReWire 2.0 support, allowing you to integrate it with other applications. Stream audio and MIDI from linked programs through Tracktion 3 for even more functionality. For those composing music for video applications, Tracktion 3 supports Quicktime video playback. You can simply select a movie and start tracking - and Quicktime and Tracktion 3 are cross-platform compatible, making it as easy to share video projects as it is to swap audio.

Editing made easy
Once tracks have been imported or recorded, Tracktion 3 presents them as easily manipulated audio clips. The MIDI editor function is also clear, easy to use, and powerful. Updates such as Folder Tracks, Collection Clips, and a handy Marker Track give you even more control than before over clips. Mix automation is a snap, and rack filter and track freezing functions allow for a streamlined mixing process that won\&#039;t choke your CPU. An amazing range of effects plug-ins included with Tracktion 3 ranges from dynamics to reverb to modulation and more, and Tracktion 3 supports third-party VST and VSTi plug-ins.

Mackie tracktion 3 Project Bundle Features:

Clutter-free, single-screen user interface keeps the music flowing

No limits on track count, virtual instruments, or plug-ins*

Acid, Apple and REX Loop Browser with automatic pitch and tempo adjustment

High-definition 64-bit/192kHz mix engine for superior sound

Rack filters for simple creation of complex instrument and effect combinations

Multi-processor / multi-core CPU support

Control surface support including Mackie Control Universal, C4 and more

Over 150 new features and enhancements from Tracktion 

IK Multimedia SampleTank 2 SE w/ 50 sound sets

IK Multimedia Amplitube Uno w/ upgrade to Duo LE

Submersible Music DrumCore TK Diet

Garritan Personal Orchestra Tracktion 3 Lite Edition powered by Native Instruments Kontakt 2 Player

LinPlug FreeAlpha classic synth

Linplug CronoX 3 Lite sample synth

LinPlug RM IV Lite drum machine w/ 100 kits and 500 MIDI loops

Mackie Mixing and Mastering Tools

Sonic Reality Tracktion 3 Project Collection w/ 500 Apple loops, 50 Rex loops, 250MB multi-track loops

SWA Video - Tracktion 3 Quick Start


MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
512MB RAM, 10GB free hard disk space, DVD-ROM drive for installation. Mac: G4/G5 or Intel processor 1GHz, OS X 10.4.8 or later. PC: Pentium or Athlon 1GHz or faster processor, Windows XP. 

DRIVER SUPPORT
ASIO, CoreAudio.

SUPPORTED SAMPLE RATES
All standard rates up to 192kHz.

PLUG-IN SUPPORT
VST, VSTi, ReWire (host only).
